title: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description:
Description: When modifying the font size of a label, the label height does not update immediately.
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Add a label to the interface.
2. Modify the font size of the label to be "18 points".
OB: After modifying the font size of the label, the height of the label remains the same as before the font modification.
EB: After modifying the font size of the label, the height of the label should adjust to accommodate the new font size.
SR:
1. Add a label to the interface.
2. Modify the font size of the label to be "18 points" and observe the height of the label to ensure it adjusts accordingly.
